evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (A) Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside OJP’s decision to conduct an en masse termination of the putative class members’ grants.

extracted.value: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside OJP’s decision to conduct an en masse termination of the putative class members’ grants

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (B) Declare unlawful, vacate, set aside Defendants’ terminations of the putative class members’ grants.

extracted.value: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside Defendants’ terminations of the putative class members’ grants

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (C) Declare that OJP’s terminations violate the Fifth Amendment’s Due Process Clause.

extracted.value: Declare that OJP’s terminations violate the Fifth Amendment’s Due Process Clause

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (D) Declare that OJP’s terminations violate the separation of powers, the Take Care Clause, and the Appropriations and Spending Clauses.

extracted.value: Declare that OJP’s terminations violate the separation of powers, the Take Care Clause, and the Appropriations and Spending Clauses

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (E) Declare that OJP’s terminations on the basis of Section 200.340(a)(4) are unlawful, including its interpretation that 2 C.F.R. § 200.340(a)(4) allows OJP to terminate a grant based on a “change” in agency priorities.

extracted.value: Declare that OJP’s terminations on the basis of Section 200.340(a)(4) are unlawful, including its interpretation that 2 C.F.R. § 200.340(a)(4) allows OJP to terminate a grant based on a “change” in agency priorities

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (F) Declare that OJP’s terminations are arbitrary, capricious, an abuse of discretion, or otherwise not in accordance with law.

extracted.value: Declare that OJP’s terminations are arbitrary, capricious, an abuse of discretion, or otherwise not in accordance with law

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (G) Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from enforcing, implementing, maintaining, or giving effect to the terminations of putative class members’ grants, including through the enforcement of closeout obligations.

extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from enforcing, implementing, maintaining, or giving effect to the terminations of putative class members’ grants, including through the enforcement of closeout obligations

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (H) Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from re-obligating the funds used to support putative class members’ terminated grants.

extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from re-obligating the funds used to support putative class members’ terminated grants

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (I) Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation from terminating Plaintiffs’ grants without notice and a reasonable opportunity to object prior to deprivation of their protected interests in grant funding.

extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation from terminating Plaintiffs’ grants without notice and a reasonable opportunity to object prior to deprivation of their protected interests in grant funding

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (J) Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from declining to spend the funds that Congress has appropriated for OJP grants.

extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from declining to spend the funds that Congress has appropriated for OJP grants

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (K) Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from terminating grants under 2 C.F.R. § 200.340(a)(4) on the basis of a “change” in agency priorities.

extracted.value: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from terminating grants under 2 C.F.R. § 200.340(a)(4) on the basis of a “change” in agency priorities

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (L) Stay the termination of the grants pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 705.

extracted.value: Stay the termination of the grants pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 705

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (M) Enter judgment in favor of Plaintiffs.

extracted.value: Enter judgment in favor of Plaintiffs

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (N) Enter an order in the exercise of the Court’s equitable powers that directs Defendants to take all steps necessary to ensure that OJP disburses funds to Plaintiffs in the customary manner and in customary timeframes.

extracted.value: Enter an order in the exercise of the Court’s equitable powers that directs Defendants to take all steps necessary to ensure that OJP disburses funds to Plaintiffs in the customary manner and in customary timeframes

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (O) Require Defendants to submit status reports every 30 days after the date of the entry of the order to ensure prompt and complete compliance with the order.

extracted.value: Require Defendants to submit status reports every 30 days after the date of the entry of the order to ensure prompt and complete compliance with the order

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (P) Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorney fees, and other disbursements as appropriate.

extracted.value: Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorney fees, and other disbursements as appropriate

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: (Q) Grant such other and further relief as the Court may deem just and proper.

extracted.value: Grant such other and further relief as the Court may deem just and proper
